def processTweets(tweet):
    '''Cleans the tweet and returns it'''
    tweet = str(tweet)
    tweet = re.sub(r'[^\w\s]','',tweet) # Remove Punctuations
    return tweet

data['text'] = data['text'].apply(processTweets)
